datasource.name: ds_formular_ventilation
datasource.sql: insert into formular_ventilation ( wkb_geometry, dato, formular, ref, stednavn, adresse, aggregatplacering, betjeningsomraade, kontaktperson_navn, kontaktperson_tlf, sagsnr, anlaeg_nr, update formular_ventilation set wkb_geometry = [geometry: ToGeometry(wkt)], dato = localtimestamp, formular = [string: formular], ref = [string: sessionid], stednavn = [string: if isDefined(stednavn) then stednavn else "" endif], adresse = [string: if isDefined(address) then address else "" endif], aggregatplacering = [string: if isDefined(aggregatplacering) then aggregatplacering else "" endif], isDefined(anlaeg_nr) then anlaeg_nr else "" endif], rev_dato = [string: if isDefined(rev_dato) then rev_dato else "" endif], rev_navn = [string: if isDefined(rev_navn) then rev_navn else "" endif], tegning_nr = [string: if isDefined(tegning_nr) then tegning_nr else "" endif], ventilationprincip = [string: if isDefined(ventilationprincip) then ventilationprincip else "" endif], vent_type = [string: if isDefined(vent_type) then vent_type else "" endif], vent_automatik = [string: if isDefined(vent_automatik) then vent_automatik else "" endif], vent_luftmaengde_proj = [number: if
